text: Josephine Diane Shirley Gibson (born 24 January 1985), known as Josie Gibson, is an English television presenter. She became famous after winning the eleventh series of Big Brother United Kingdom. She later appeared on Ultimate Big Brother in 2011 but quit the programme. Since appearing on Big Brother, Gibson has become a television presenter. She has worked on the daytime programme This Morning since 2019. In 2023, she was a contestant on I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Note(s) 2010 Big Brother Contestant Winner Ultimate Big Brother Contestant 8 Out of 10 Cats Guest; 1 episode Josie and John James: What Happened Next Presenter 2011 OK!
